features: 5.8-fluid ounce bottle of Neutrogena Fragrance Free Ultra Gentle Foaming Facial Cleanser for sensitive skin that gently and effectively cleanses skin without disrupting its natural moisture barrier

The gentle facial cleanser developed by dermatologists works in a new skin-friendly way to leave you with clean yet naturally soft skin. The non-stripping formula washes away excess oil, dirt and removes makeup without over-drying or irritating skin

From a dermatologist recommended skincare brand, this gentle foaming facial cleanser was developed with dermatologists specifically to cleanse sensitive skin. The hydrating cleanser rinses clean, leaving no pore-clogging residue behind

The hypoallergenic facial cleanser is free of fragrance, soaps and dyes and is gentle enough for sensitive skin. The daily foaming cleanser is noncomedogenic, so it rinses clean and won't clog your pores

This daily cleanser is gentle on sensitive skin and makes a great addition to a daily skincare routine. To use, wet face, pump cleanser into hand and work into a foamy lather. Massage gently onto your face and rinse clean
body.description: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Ultra Gentle Daily Foaming Facial Cleanser developed by dermatologists to gently cleanse sensitive skin. The fragrance free wash thoroughly cleanses without disrupting skin's natural moisture balance. This extra gentle face wash works in a new, skin-friendly way to leave you with clean yet naturally soft skin. The non-stripping formula thoroughly removes excess oil, dirt and makeup without over-drying or irritating skin. The hydrating face wash for sensitive skin is free of fragrance, soaps and dyes. The hypoallergenic cleanser rinses clean and is non-comedogenic, so it won't clog your pores. This daily cleanser is gentle on sensitive skin and makes a great addition to a daily skincare routine. To use, wet face, pump cleanser into hand and work into a foamy lather. Massage gently onto your face and rinse clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the second time I’ve purchased this. It doesn’t smell like anything, there’s no dye in it and it doesn’t irritate my skin. I use this every single day twice a day! It removes light makeup but I always double cleanse and it works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I gave this a try and I was pleasantly surprised! My skin felt so much lighter and it removed all of my make up and impurities. It left my face with a nice healthy glow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin. Most cleansers make my skin feel tight and irritated. This does not. It gently cleans, has no fragrance, and is my cost effective go to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have very dry skin and this leaves my skin feeling great after every wash. Takes off mascara and makeup SO wonderfully. No need to spend a ton on cleanser. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This face wash did a nice job without drying my skin. You need to wet your face first as per directions and it “foams” into a lotion like cleanser. Nice value. Delicate results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple wash for a clean face - ready for my daily/nightly routine
reviews.reviewText: Why I like this facial cleanser. So...I have used the cream cleansers and the oil based cleansers during both my day and night time routine and I have to say for me, this is the best cleanser for simplification to part of my skin care routine.Now typically if you have dry skin or are into "anti-aging" you would consider a cream or oil based cleanser, do find what works best for you. But this is why I dig the Neutrogena Ultra Gentle daily cleanser.So I am into the anti-aging skin care regimens, but I often found that some cleanser were not cleaning the make up or oils from my skin and that would result in breakouts or the need to go through the cleansing routine again. So I was looking for something that would clean well, but not dry and destroy my skin. I should also mention that I have oilier skin and I love a good routine.I discovered this cleanser from my sister and after giving it a try I can tell you, it cleanses wonderfully and it is the least expensive product in my arsenal of skin care, it is nice to give my budget a break by using this product.So if you have 40+ year old skin, want a simple cleanser that works and is easy on the budget, I would recommend this Neutrogena cleanser. Did I mention it doesn't have any scent? Well I love a hypo-allergenic product you all know we do not need those synthetic perfumes anywhere near our our skin.Keep it simple, give it a try and don't forget to moisturize and hydrate after your cleansing routine ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Must be very gentle. Goes on smooth, BARELY lathers, washes off REAL quick.I assume it is cleaning my face

reviews.reviewText: easy to use, my skin its more soft. super recommended
